text: There's a particular song from Deathsmiles IIX I'm hoping will show up... I can't seem to find it anywhere though.
author: Sephiko

text: I always love the music composed by Falcom Sound Team JDK.  It is always nice to listen to.  I really like how energetic this song is.  I'm glad that i got to play a Sega CD game earlier this year.
author: Eric C.

text: I still have a big backlog of older games I want to play, including this Action RPG. This is from the Sega CD version which has my favorite music, but Falcom later ported it on the SNES. I feel bad for the blue fish on the right, those are the eyes of a fish who's seen the fate of his blue friends on the backwall, he's trying hard not to look.
author: SupraDarky

text: This was one of my old favorites from back in the day. Gameplay borders on 'meh' but the money is in Working Designs localization. The characters ooze personality and there are countless LOL moments. (even better if you're familiar with the 90s) It's a shame it's only around 4-5 hours long ...
author: Matt Waller
